type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type. It has to be Feeder

category.description: Property. Indicates the catagory of the Feeder.

feederStatus.description: Property. Indicates the status of the feeder.

feederExpectedStatus.description: Property. Indicates the expected status of the feeder following the initial program.

feedingAuthorisationStatus.description: Property. Indicates if the feeding is authorised or not

feederExecutionRation.description: Property. Indicates the ration of feeder execution according to the feeder status and the feeder expected status values

programModificationStatus.description: Property.Inducated the date and time of the last program modification with the new values.

startsAt.description: Object.Inducated the starting time of feeding.

endsAt.description: Object.Inducated the ending time of feeding.

duration.description: Object.Inducated the time range of each feeding process.
